name: Digital Growth REIT, Inc.
description: Digital Growth REIT, Inc. is a real estate investment trust focused on acquiring and managing a diversified portfolio of properties primarily in the digital technology and data center sectors. Founded in 2018, the company aims to capitalize on the increasing demand for digital infrastructure driven by the rapid expansion of cloud computing, big data, and the Internet of Things (IoT). Digital Growth REIT strategically invests in properties that are critical to the digital economy, including data centers, server farms, and technology-focused commercial real estate. The company emphasizes sustainability and energy efficiency in its operations, striving to reduce the carbon footprint of its assets. As a publicly traded entity, Digital Growth REIT provides investors with an opportunity to gain exposure to the growing digital real estate market while benefiting from regular dividend distributions. The company's mission is to support the digital transformation of businesses by providing high-quality real estate solutions that meet the evolving needs of the technology sector.

seo.meta_title: Digital Growth REIT, Inc. | Investing in Digital Real Estate
seo.meta_description: Explore Digital Growth REIT, Inc., a leading real estate investment trust focused on the digital technology sector. Discover our portfolio and commitment to sustainability.
